Suggestion - add a slack integration which allows a person to buy a HS developer a beer for adding something cool/fixing something

Hi all, the new Content Settings will be available to all this coming Tuesday. That will include some changes to the Advance Menu tool, mainly, the ability to rename and clone. We have also made the Drag and Drop easier to use.

Suggestion: itâ€™d be awesome if the icons in the follow me widget could be re-arranged or put in a specific order within the social settings (clients and designers often want to highlight specific ones) While I could build a whole new follow me module, I prefer to use the HS one since it requires clients to hook up their Social accounts anyways, encouraging them to use those tools.

Anyways current work around is using flexbox to re-order them to the order the client wants.
